title: Panel, early 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave
description: 42 scenes within a square grid (7 over 6) with animals, humans, gods, and demons. Grid divides the scenes by a thin border with geometric design. Each scene displays what seems to be some writing. Bright colors (reds and blues) on white cotton ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, early 20th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: dyed and painted on plain weave. 1974-9-2.
